inclusion.criterion: Age 18 years or above, male or female
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Documented relapse or non-response to a prior adequate course of peginterferon and ribavirin
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Genotype 1 HCV as determined by probe specific hybridization (Inno-Lipa assay).
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated liver disease, as marked by serum bilirubin greater than 4 mg percent, albumin less than 3.0 gm percent, prothrombin time greater than 2 sec prolonged, or history of bleeding esophageal varices, ascites or hepatic encephalopathy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Serum Alanine transaminase (ALT) or Aspartate transaminase (AST) levels greater than 1000 U/L (greater than 25 times the ULN).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or, in women of child bearing potential or in spouses of pregnant women, inability to practice adequate contraception.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy with IFN and RBV. He does not have any contraindications for the trial.
